plastic.title: DIY Planter Pot
plastic.description: Cut a plastic bottle in half, smooth the edges, and decorate it with natural colors or jute rope. It becomes a durable plant pot that promotes home gardening.

plastic.title: Plastic Bottle Desk Organizer
plastic.description: Use the bottom halves of bottles to store pens, clips, and small stationery items. Attach them to cardboard for a multi-slot mini organizer.

plastic.title: Eco-Friendly Watering Can
plastic.description: Reuse a large plastic bottle by poking small holes in the cap. It works as a lightweight watering can for indoor plants.

glass.title: Ambient Candle Holder
glass.description: Clean a glass jar, wrap it with jute rope or paint simple patterns, and place a candle inside to create a warm decorative candle holder.

glass.title: Herb Storage Jar
glass.description: Transform old glass jars into kitchen storage for herbs, spices, or dry snacks by labeling and sealing them properly.

glass.title: Mini Terrarium
glass.description: Use a transparent glass jar to build a small terrarium with soil, pebbles, and a tiny succulent or moss.

paper.title: Handmade Eco Notepad
paper.description: Bind unused one-side blank papers together to create a small pocket notepad for daily to-do lists or rough work.

paper.title: Decorative Paper Flowers
paper.description: Reuse colored or printed waste paper to make beautiful origami flowers that can be used as wall d√©cor.

paper.title: Seed Paper
paper.description: Blend old paper with water, mix natural seeds, and press it into thin sheets. Once dry, it can be planted to grow herbs or flowers.

metal.title: Metal Can Pen Holder
metal.description: Clean and smooth an old metal can, paint it creatively, and use it as a sturdy pen or brush holder for your study desk.

metal.title: Mini Plant Pot
metal.description: Repurpose steel or tin cans as small planters for herbs and succulents, adding holes at the bottom for drainage.

metal.title: Tool Organizer
metal.description: Mount metal cans on a wooden board to create a wall-hanging organizer for storing small tools, screws, and household items.

cardboard.title: DIY Drawer Organizer
cardboard.description: Cut cardboard into different-sized partitions and arrange them inside a drawer to neatly sort stationery or accessories.

cardboard.title: Smartphone Stand
cardboard.description: Make a simple phone stand using layered cardboard pieces with a small slot for holding the mobile at an angle.

cardboard.title: Eco-Friendly Gift Box
cardboard.description: Reuse thick cardboard sheets to craft gift boxes that can be decorated using cloth or paper scraps.
